name: Ninja Bot
description:
Lore

Year 2130, humanity is borderline facing extinction after the invasion of the dreadful space robots, subdued by "The Evil Controller", squeezing life out of any live being on Earth, from which it sucks energetic resources until they are spent, then goes to conquer other planets.

Fortunately, among the small number of humans that are remaining on Earth, our hero, Asuro Miyagi, one of the last descendants of japanese ninjas, suits himself up on high-tech gear designed to fight the supremacy of this robots. Thanks to this technology and his knowledge of ninjutsu and powerful weapons, he will face dangers and traps to get to avoid the extinction of life on Earth.

The game

Ninja bot is a 2.5D platformer game, with a fully 3D scene but with a 2D perspective, and side-scrolling. The objective of the game is to reach the end of each level, dodging traps and enemies and solving puzzles. It has various levels, which will grow in difficulty along with the progress of the player.

After beating some levels, new traps, enemies and obstacles are added to the game, combining them in different ways to increase challenge and fun. After finishing all of the levels Asuro Miyagi will have to face "The Evil Controller".
